summary: This mod aims to give the city of Morthal a more distinct look as well as adding a few new features. Currently in very early development stage.
descriptionHtml:
This mod aims to give the city of Morthal a more distinct look as well as adding a few new features.

I changed the textures of the buildings in Morthal to make them look as if the were made of stone. Also, it seemed strange to me that every house had a fireplace but none of them had a chimney, so I added some. And moreover I wanted to make the Jarl's house and guard house look a bit more fortified.

Included so far:
- Retextured all buildings and interiors
- Added a few new buildings (Towers, General Store) with interiors
- Added chimneys to the rooftops
- Fortified the Jarl's Hall and the Guardhouse

Planned:
- A few new NPCs (Primarily for the store)

Known issues:
- Stone texture on the roofs underside

The mod is currently in a very early development stage and therefore I strongly advise against using it in your normal gameplay yet.
author: alphanumeric

files.name: AMereMorthalMod_alpha_v0_02
files.changelogHtml:
Interiors for the new buildings (Store, Armoury and Guardhouse Tower)
New custom textures (mostly 2k resolution)
Using snowy textures for walkways and rooftops instead of flickering shaders
